Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger Another creature attempts a check to investigate a lead you're pursuing

You share information with the triggering creature.

They gain a circumstance bonus to their check equal to your circumstance bonus to checks investigating your subject from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Pursue a Lead]. The GM can add any relevant traits to this reaction depending on the situation, such as auditory and linguistic if you're conveying information verbally.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Clue In]
